message_1: Consider a fuzzy set A on the domain [0,10], defined by the membership function μA(x) = min(x, 10-x). Determine the degree of membership of the number 6 in A.
message_2:
To determine the degree of membership of the number 6 in the fuzzy set A, we need to evaluate the membership function μA(x) at x = 6.

μA(6) = min(6, 10-6)
μA(6) = min(6, 4)

The minimum value between 6 and 4 is 4.

Therefore, the degree of membership of the number 6 in the fuzzy set A is 4.
